attributes.action: Stop all attempts to create an Identity Card Database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current proposals to make all citizens of this country carry an electronic Identity Card are unworkable.  We, the undersigned, will refuse to co-operate in this process as we have no confidence in the confidentiality of government records and we know that there is no IT system capable of handling the proposed data.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
